name: icraft-monorepo
description: iCraftStories - AI-powered illustrated story creation platform

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && (npm run lint || echo 'Backend linting not configured')
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && (npm run test || echo 'Frontend tests not configured')
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.repo:status: gh repo view --json name,description,url,pushedAt && git submodule status
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Run npm run setup to initialize submodules and install dependencies'

author: iCraftStories Team
